name: UPolygonOnMeshToolProperties
doc: Standard properties of the polygon-on-mesh operations

Operation: What operation to apply using the Polygon
Shape: Polygon Shape to use in this Operation
bCutWithBoolean: Use a volumetric boolean rather than curve projection; cuts through all layers and across edges
bTryToFixHoles: Automatically attempt to fill any open boundaries left by CSG (e.g. due to numerical errors)
Subdivisions: Number of sides in Circle or RoundRect Corner
bCanAcceptFailedResult:
Whether the tool will allow accepting a result if the operation fails, for instance due to inability to insert the
polygon when not cutting with boolean, or due to unrepaired cracks in the result.
bShowIntermediateResultOnFailure:
If an operation fails and we do not allow accepting the result, whether to show the intermediate failed result, or to
show the original mesh.
